ai-pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.1_0: Either lust, a nun, consents to a lustful man making physical contact with her, she commits an offense entailing confession.

ai-pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.1_0: curd that they have asked for, but there is an offense entailing acknowledgment.
